m_szDocTitle: Tesla Model Xs For Test Drives Coming Soon (Rumor) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Model Xs For Test Drives Coming Soon (Rumor) Originally published on EV Obsession . Tesla showrooms in Austin, Texas (and presumably elsewhere as well) are going to soon be receiving new show models of the Model X SUV, according to recent reports. Of particular note in that regard was a recent comment made on the Tesla Motors Club forum by the commenter “ ivengo ” that noted that a sales rep at the Domain Tesla Store claimed that a Model X would be arriving within a few weeks.
